title: Does the Poco F1 support 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the question Hari Vignesh! POCO F1 is not a 5G compatible phone, rather it supports till 4G. The screenshot taken from Mi POCO F1 technical specification gives a better insight into the same.  POCO F1 Specification Link : Poco F1 Specification - Mi India Thanks and Regards, Anubhav David

No, the Snapdragon 845 platform has got a 4G modem only. 5G modem is not even available in 855 but if the manufacturer is interested they may use 855 mobile platform with Qualcomm’s newest 5G modems. This is the reason we are seeing 5G phones with 855 and their price is sky high. It is rumoured that 865(rumoured name) will be having two variants. 5G and 4G (both integrated to the SOC). Hope it helps!
